0.title: Privacy
0.detail: We respect your right to access and delete your data under Moroccan Law No. 09-08 on the Protection of Individuals with Regard to the Processing of Personal Data.

1.title: Safety
1.detail: With built-in filters, you can enjoy social media and control the content you consume without impacting yourself negatively or in a bad way.
